corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Calculate the area of a rectangle.

correct_function_arguments.name: length
correct_function_arguments.description: Length of the rectangle in units.

correct_function_arguments.name: width
correct_function_arguments.description: Width of the rectangle in units.

correct_function_return_values.description: Area of the rectangle in square units.

calculate_area.summary_of_findings: Perfect docstring with all parameters and return value correctly documented with accurate types and clear descriptions.

correct_function_arguments.name: name
correct_function_arguments.description: Full name of the user.

correct_function_arguments.name: age
correct_function_arguments.description: Age of the user in years.

correct_function_arguments.name: city
correct_function_arguments.description: City where the user lives.

create_user_profile.summary_of_findings: Missing 'city' parameter in docstring. All documented parameters have correct types and descriptions.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Count occurrences of items up to a specified limit.

correct_function_arguments.name: items
correct_function_arguments.description: List of items to count.

correct_function_arguments.name: count
correct_function_arguments.description: Maximum number of items to process.

correct_function_return_values.description: Dictionary mapping items to their occurrence counts.

count_item_frequencies.summary_of_findings: Parameter 'items' documented as 'str' but should be 'List[str]'. Parameter 'count' documented as 'str' but should be 'int'. Return type documented as 'list' but should be 'Dict[str, int]'.

correct_function_arguments.name: x
correct_function_arguments.description: First number to add.

correct_function_arguments.name: y
correct_function_arguments.description: Second number to add.

add_integers.summary_of_findings: Docstring includes parameters 'z' and 'multiplier' that don't exist in function signature. Only 'x' and 'y' parameters should be documented.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Validate dataset size against a threshold.

correct_function_arguments.name: data
correct_function_arguments.description: List of data records to validate.

correct_function_arguments.name: threshold
correct_function_arguments.description: Minimum number of records required for valid dataset.

correct_function_return_values.description: True if dataset has more records than threshold, False otherwise.

validate_dataset.summary_of_findings: Parameter descriptions are too vague ('Some data', 'A number'). Return description is too vague ('True or False'). Need more specific and helpful descriptions.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Load configuration from a JSON file.

correct_function_arguments.name: file_path
correct_function_arguments.description: Path to the JSON configuration file.

correct_function_arguments.name: encoding
correct_function_arguments.description: File encoding to use when reading. Defaults to 'utf-8'.

correct_function_return_values.description: Dictionary containing the loaded configuration data.

load_config_file.summary_of_findings: Missing return documentation entirely. Return type should be 'Dict[str, any]' with description of what is returned.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Calculate the average of a list of numbers.

correct_function_arguments.name: numbers
correct_function_arguments.description: List of integers to average.

correct_function_return_values.description: Average value of the numbers as a floating point number.

calculate_mean.summary_of_findings: Return type documented as 'int' but should be 'float' since division can produce floating point results.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Normalize string case based on sensitivity setting.

correct_function_arguments.name: value
correct_function_arguments.description: String value to normalize.

correct_function_arguments.name: case_sensitive
correct_function_arguments.description: Whether to preserve original case. Defaults to False.

correct_function_return_values.description: Normalized string, either original case or lowercase.

normalize_string.summary_of_findings: No docstring provided. All parameters and return value need to be documented with types and descriptions.

get_system_status.summary_of_findings: Function description is unhelpful ('does something mysterious'). Missing return type documentation. No parameters to document.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Format text string to specified length with padding.

correct_function_arguments.name: text
correct_function_arguments.description: The text content to format.

correct_function_arguments.name: max_length
correct_function_arguments.description: Maximum length for the formatted text.

correct_function_arguments.name: pad_char
correct_function_arguments.description: Character to use for padding. Defaults to ' '.

correct_function_return_values.description: Formatted text string, truncated or padded to specified length.

format_text_output.summary_of_findings: Parameter name mismatch: 'content' in docstring vs 'text' in signature. Parameter 'max_length' documented as 'float' but should be 'int'. Missing 'pad_char' parameter. Return type documented as 'list' but should be 'str'.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Generate configuration string from name and dictionary.

correct_function_arguments.name: name
correct_function_arguments.description: Name for the configuration.

correct_function_arguments.name: config
correct_function_arguments.description: Configuration dictionary with string values. Defaults to None.

build_config_string.summary_of_findings: Parameter 'config' documented as 'Dict[str, str]' but should be 'Optional[Dict[str, str]]' since it has a default value of None.

corrected_function_docstring.correct_function_description: Print a message to the console.

correct_function_arguments.name: message
correct_function_arguments.description: Message to print to the console.

correct_function_return_values.description: This function does not return a value.

print_to_console.summary_of_findings: Perfect docstring with parameter and return value correctly documented. Return type 'None' is properly documented with explanation.
